entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is described as leading Harry past the little elves in the kitchen. He is wearing a tea towel with the Hogwarts crest, tied like a toga.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being led by Dobby past the little elves in the kitchen.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is described as sitting on a stool by the fire, wearing a neat little skirt and blouse with a matching blue hat.

entities.name: hundred little elves
entities.description: The hundred little elves are standing around the kitchen, beaming, bowing, and curtsying as Dobby leads Harry past them. They are all wearing the same uniform: a tea towel stamped with the Hogwarts crest.

entities.name: kitchen
entities.description: The kitchen is where Dobby and Harry are walking through, surrounded by the hundred little elves.

entities.name: harry's counterparts above
entities.description: Harry's counterparts above are mentioned as receiving dishes sent up through the ceiling from below.

relationships.description: Dobby is leading Harry past the hundred little elves in the kitchen.
Winky is sitting on a stool by the fireplace.
